taxa_por_uf.question: Qual a taxa de inadimplência por UF?
taxa_por_uf.sql: SELECT "UF", AVG("TARGET") as taxa_inadimplencia FROM credit_train GROUP BY "UF" HAVING COUNT(*) >= 20 ORDER BY taxa_inadimplencia DESC

taxa_geral.question: Qual a taxa de inadimplência geral?
taxa_geral.sql: SELECT AVG("TARGET") as taxa_inadimplencia FROM credit_train

volume_total.question: Quantos registros existem?
volume_total.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as volume FROM credit_train

evolucao_mensal.question: Evolução mensal da inadimplência
evolucao_mensal.sql: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', "REF_DATE") as mes, AVG("TARGET") as taxa FROM credit_train GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) >= 20 ORDER BY 1

taxa_por_sexo.question: Taxa de inadimplência por sexo
taxa_por_sexo.sql: SELECT "SEXO", AVG("TARGET") as taxa, COUNT(*) as n FROM credit_train GROUP BY "SEXO" HAVING COUNT(*) >= 20
